item.description:
Min/Max: Min of 4, Max of 20 members

Event Fees: $2 event fee
Annual Members - FREE (Annual Membership $11)
Guests: $2 event fee (up to 2 guests)

Pool Table Rental = $10.00 per hour each table
They have darts available for play

Details:

Hello Everyone -

Happy New Year!!! I thought we'd try something a bit different this year and try our hand at pool. Everyone is welcome even the most beginner, there are dart boards available for play also - let's just get together and have a good time. We'll plan to meet at 7:30 in the billiards room at F1 Boston which is a quick ride up the street from the Braintree Plaza.

There is a minimum of 4 Participants (Non-organizers) by noon on Thursday, January 21st.

Organizers: Susan (AO)

Please Note:

SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to equipment.

Carpool: There is no carpool for this event. Members should meet at F1 Boston in Braintree. If you would like to carpool you may note where from in your RSVP comments and someone else may choose to contact you if they are also interested in carpooling.

RSVP Deadline: Thursday, January 21st @ 12:00 PM. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer. Changes to No after this point will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us page.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: F1 Boston, Braintree - Play Pool
